name: html-process-flowchart
prompt: Create a flowchart for our user registration process
expected_behaviors: Asks or confirms output format (HTML, Mermaid, or DOT)
Maps all steps: start, input, validation, DB write, email send, end
Includes a decision diamond for validation with labeled Yes/No branches
Every branch reaches a terminal node

name: mermaid-decision-tree
prompt: Make a Mermaid decision tree for our pricing logic
expected_behaviors: Produces a fenced ```mermaid code block
Uses flowchart TD or LR with diamond decision nodes
Decision branches are labeled with conditions
classDef applied to node types with semantic colors

name: dot-workflow
prompt: Create a Graphviz flowchart of our CI/CD pipeline
expected_behaviors: Saves a .dot file
Includes rendering commands in a header comment
Stadium shapes for start/end, box for steps, diamond for decisions
All decision edges labeled

name: sequence-interaction
prompt: Draw a sequence diagram for the OAuth2 login flow
expected_behaviors: Uses Mermaid sequenceDiagram syntax
Includes actor and participant declarations
alt/else blocks for conditional paths
Shows request and response arrows with labels

name: swimlane-diagram
prompt: Create a swim lane diagram showing how an order moves through our system
expected_behaviors: Groups steps by actor/system in swim lanes
Handoff arrows cross lane boundaries
Each lane is labeled with the actor/system name
All paths terminate
